application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Ligustrum Japonicum - Reduce height by approx. 1m & trim to shape.G.2 Pittosporum - Reduce spread of group by approx. 50%, reduce height by approx. 2m & trim to tidy. T.3 Pittosporum - Reduce height by approx. 1m & trim to shape. T.4 Camellia - Reduce height by approx. 1m & trim to shape. T.5 Cordyline Australis - Fell.T.6 Magnolia Grandiflora - Fell.		 T.7 Pittosporum - Remove 3 stems leaning towards garden path on rear boundary. T.8  Griselinia - Reduce height by approx. 2m & trim sides to shape. T.9  Magnolia Soulangeana - 2m holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points. T.10 Pear - Deadwood only.
